body_html:
There're some remaining longs in the csrc that caused this problem. I replaced almost all of them into int64_t except the one in the template definition of python_function.cpp and then the problem was solved.
BTW: All of the test cases passed including CUDA except multiprocessing.

body:
There're some remaining longs in the csrc that caused this problem. I replaced almost all of them into int64_t except the one in the template definition of python_function.cpp and then the problem was solved.
BTW: All of the test cases passed including CUDA except multiprocessing.
